game.name: Intergalactic Juice Bar
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Slice fruits with a physics-based knife on a rope. Upgrade your factory to slice fruit into smaller pieces. Buy advanced slicing technology. Maximize profits and quench thirst across the universe!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slice fruits with a physics-based knife on a rope. Upgrade your factory to slice fruit into smaller pieces. Buy advanced slicing technology. Maximize profits and quench thirst across the universe!
